data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 33,900 people living in the state of San Marino.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Marino, San Marino
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 24 believers in San Marino to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of San Marino words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call San Marino, San Marino into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in San Marino.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 24 believers in San Marino, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in San Marino, San Marino so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of San Marino, San Marino has a population of 33,900.

We estimate San Marino has 24 people who might know Jesus, 28,521 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,355 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,412 neighbors who need Jesus.
